title: AutoJoinName
description: Automatically joins games with a configured name
author: retrozy

title: Map Version Control
description: A Git like version control for creative maps with commits, branches, stashing, and project management
author: Coderofpears

title: Blooket Redirector
description: Play Blooket Games Inside Gimkit
author: Coderofpears

title: AutoKicker
description: Automatically kicks players from your lobby with a customizable set of rules
author: TheLazySquid

title: Autosplitter
description: Automatically times speedruns for various gamemodes
author: TheLazySquid

title: BringBackBoosts
description: Restores boosts in Don't Look Down. Will cause you to desync, so others cannot see you move.
author: TheLazySquid

title: CameraControl
description: Lets you freely move and zoom your camera
author: TheLazySquid & Blackhole927

title: CharacterCustomization
description: Allows you to use any gim or a custom gim client-side
author: TheLazySquid

title: Chat
description: Adds an in-game chat to 2d gamemodes
author: TheLazySquid

title: ConfirmClose
description: Ask for confirmation before closing the tab when in-game
author: TheLazySquid

title: CrazyFlag
description: Make the flags in capture the flag or creative swing like crazy!
author: TheLazySquid

title: CustomUI
description: Allows you to customize various things about the Gimkit UI
author: TheLazySquid

title: Desynchronize
description: Disables the client being snapped back by the server, others cannot see you move. Breaks most gamemodes.
author: TheLazySquid

title: DLDTAS
description: Allows you to create TASes for Dont Look Down
author: TheLazySquid

title: FixCrashes
description: Attempts to prevent natural game crashes
author: retrozy

title: FixTileDupe
description: Prevents you from placing a terrain twice on the same cell area, helpful in Dig It Up.
author: retrozy

title: GamemodeLinks
description: Creates game rooms from links, particularly useful in bookmarks.
author: retrozy

title: GameTimeMS
description: Allows millisecond precision in the game timer
author: retrozy

title: GuestControls
description: Allows guests to perform host actions in 2d modes, when the host has this plugin on.
author: retrozy

title: Healthbars
description: Adds healthbars underneath players' names
author: TheLazySquid

title: IdleForXp
description: Automatically performs actions to let you gain XP while idle
author: TheLazySquid

title: InfoLines
description: Displays a configurable list of info on the screen
author: TheLazySquid

title: InputRecorder
description: Records your inputs in Don't Look Down
author: TheLazySquid

title: InstantUse
description: Instantly use nearby devices without any wait
author: TheLazySquid

title: KitTimesPlayed
description: Shows the number of times that kits have been played on the kits screen
author: retrozy

title: 2dMovementTAS
description: Allows for making TASes of CTF and tag
author: TheLazySquid

title: NoSchoolHours
description: Bypasses the discovery page school hours
author: retrozy

title: PerformantGims
description: Replaces configurable gims with images of them. Looks like crap, runs really fast.
author: TheLazySquid

title: PhysicsSettings
description: Allows you to configure various things about the physics in platformer modes (client-side only)
author: TheLazySquid

title: PlayerCollision
description: Makes you collide with other players in 2d gamemodes
author: retrozy

title: QuickReset
description: Quickly lets you restart 2d gamemodes
author: TheLazySquid

title: Savestates
description: Allows you to save and load states/summits in Don't Look Down. Only client side, nobody else can see you move.
author: TheLazySquid

title: ShiftConfirm
description: Makes confirm popups resolve instantly when holding shift.
author: retrozy

title: SingleTab
description: Opens gamemodes in the current tab instead of a new tab.
author: retrozy

title: Teleport
description: Ctrl+Click to teleport anywhere and a command to teleport to a player client-side
author: TheLazySquid

title: ToggleTerrainType
description: Quickly toggle whether you are placing terrain as walls or as floor. Allows you to place tiles as floors in platformer mode.
author: TheLazySquid

title: UncappedSettings
description: Lets you start games with a much wider range of settings than normal
author: TheLazySquid
